page.title: American Air Parent AMR Posts Loss
page.text: DALLAS (Reuters) - American Airlines' parent AMR Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=AMR.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">AMR.N</A> on Wednesday posted a third-quarter loss as record-high oil prices battered its bottom line and threatened to make fourth-quarter losses even larger.
